# Kilowatt PR - Instalación de Placas Solares Puerto Rico

## About this site
This site is for Kilowatt PR LLC, a solar panel installation company serving Puerto Rico. We provide residential and commercial solar energy solutions.

## Main Services
- Solar panel installation
- Battery storage systems
- Roof sealing services
- Solar maintenance and cleaning
- Energy audits and consultations

## Target Keywords
- placas solares puerto rico
- instalación paneles solares
- energía solar residencial
- baterías solares
- sellado de techo
- ahorro energético

## Service Areas
We serve all municipalities in Puerto Rico including:
- San Juan Metropolitan Area
- Bayamón, Carolina, Caguas
- Ponce, Mayagüez, Arecibo
- All other municipalities island-wide

## Contact Information
- Phone: (787) 555-0123
- Email: info@kilowattpr.com
- Website: https://kilowattpr.com
- Address: 123 Calle Solar, San Juan, PR 00926

## Content Strategy
Focus on practical solar information for Puerto Rico residents, addressing local concerns like:
- Hurricane preparedness with battery backup
- LUMA Energy rate increases
- Federal and local solar incentives
- Tropical climate considerations
- Local permitting processes

## Technical Details
- Built with React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- SEO optimized for Puerto Rico solar market
- Mobile-responsive design
- WhatsApp integration for customer service
- Lead capture and contact forms
